20101216231457.714|20101216231459.143|CCO|THEY ALLOWED CNN, ME,

20101216231500.571|20101216231502.000|CCO|COVER THE TALKS.

20101216231503.429|20101216231504.857|CCO|DAY HERE.

20101216231512.000|20101216231514.000|CCO|>> WOLF, WHAT HAVE YOU SEEN SO

20101216231518.000|20101216231520.000|CCO|PYONGYANG ON AIR KOREA, WHICH IS
